title: Blatant racism in pre game lobbies
body:
Just had a game with this kid [removed]

In the pre game lobby he starts spamming "I hate %%%%%%s" "%%%%%%s are %%%gots" etc etc a LOT of it just repeated over and over

I told him my family are aboriginal and I'll be reporting him, he called my family abo%%%%%%s and asked if I was a %%% because all aboriginals are a %%%.

Then him and the 3 others on my team all bragged about how you can say whatever you want in lobbies and not get banned

how is it acceptable to allow these morons to say shit like that and as long as the do it in the pre game lobby there's zero repercussions

replies.body:
+1 what @seras dragon said too...

If you feel it necessary, send a report.

If you really feel hard done by it, then please, log a support ticket.

Replying with "but I am xxxx" only feeds the troll and they'll keep going because they got a rise out of someone.

> **Reporting Other Players**
>
Please don't name names. If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, send us a ticket directly so we can investigate and take action if necessary. We know that players report publicly with the best intentions, but it often leads to a witchhunt, rarely resulting in a positive discussion. We'll be taking action against players who have violated rules, so please report these players correctly.

>Moderators will be looking for the following:

>* Posts that accuse others of being toxic players in-game
* Posts accusing others of malicious activity
* Posts that accuse others of cheating or using illegal services
* Posts accusing others of trolling in the boards (thereâ€™s a report button for that)

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules
___
Last we heard lobby and post game chat is now also recognised by the IFS (it was always used in manual reviews).

> We've been working on a system that involves looking through champ select and post-game chats looking for instances of verbal abuse or unsportsmanlike behaviour.

>this is a relatively new system that is being trialed

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/RHaLh1FE-suspension-without-cause?comment=0006
___

If you dodged the lobby or otherwise couldn't report in post game, you can submit a ticket to Player Support instead: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Please bear in mind though that Support can't give out any info regarding someone else's account or the actions taken against it, so you'll just get a generic, "thanks for your report" type reply.

___

While it doesn't excuse the behaviour, I also wouldn't recommend broadcasting things like your family being aboriginal. You knew he was being a bigoted ass and proceeded to paint a nice bright target on your back. The only one who gains from that is the one being toxic.
